subject: Delivery to Poland
description_text:
Hello,

Please tell me why i can't order pedals from your website to Poland?

Best regsrds
Paweł Banaś

conversations.body_text: Hi Paweł Banaś,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland  https:/fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn

Hi,

Thanks for the answer. Unfortunately on your main website with discount
code set with brake and throtle are over 200 PLN cheaper :( but ok, if it
is the only way, i need to wait for nie with buying.

Best regsrds
Paweł Banaś

śr., 7 sty 2026, 15:31 użytkownik support@simsonn.com
Hi Paweł Banaś,  May I ask what “NIE listing” means? Is it a platform?
